mapper.insert: insert into omakase.post(title, content, nickname, category) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{category})
mapper.update: update omakase.post set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category} where postId = #{postId}
mapper.select: select * from omakase.post where category = #{category} order by createdAt desc
select p.post_id, p.title, p.created_at, u.nickname from POST p left join USER u ON p.post_id order by p.created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{recordSize}
